'''Radiant Spincrystal 80''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Halcyon Times]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on top of a crate near the entrance of [[Lambad's Tavern]].
